Package solidstack.query

Class Summary
GStringBuilder A builder for Groovy's GString.
Query A query object will normally be constructed by a call to QueryManager.bind(String, Map).
QueryManager Reads, compiles and caches the queries.
QueryTemplate Represents the query template.
QueryTransformer Translates a query template into a Groovy Closure.
ResultHolder<T> Needed to store results from an anonymous inner class method.
ResultList A wrapper around a list of arrays.
ResultListIterator Wraps a iterator from the list of arrays and gives Map instances instead of arrays.
UrlResource A resource described by a URL.
Util Generic utilities.
ValuesMap Decorates an Object array to let it look like a Map.
 

Exception Summary
QueryNotFoundException The requested query is not found.
